overview: Avi Love takes advantage of her stay in Paris to find Ricky Mancini one of his former lovers. A fan of submission games, Ricky has organized a special reunion evening.  Avi and Lana are determined to make the most of their stay in Paris. So, after a long day of shopping in the capital's chicest boutiques, the two young women, accompanied by Rico Simmons and Vince, want only one thing, to try on every outfit they bought.  For her part, Lana couldn't leave without paying Kristof one last visit. To thank him once again for being present for her birthday party, the young woman is determined to offer him a gift in return.
title: Pornochic 31 : Avi & Lana
